value.title: TuSimple starts self-driving truck network with UPS, Berkshire Hathaway's McLane
value.excerpt: U.S. technology company TuSimple on Wednesday launched a self-driving freight network with UPS and Berkshire Hathaway Inc supply chain unit McLane that it said should operate nationwide by 2024 and start running some driverless trucks routes by 2021.
